description:

- Watch HD movie trailers anytime
- Discover new releases and upcoming hits
- Fast and easy to use – no sign-in required

This app is designed for true movie lovers who want quick access to trailers and updates without any hassle. Perfect for staying up to date with new movies and blockbusters in one place.

- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows

Goojara – The Browser That Knows You Best

The internet should feel simple, fast, and personal. That’s why we built Goojara—a browser designed around you. With privacy at its core, speed in every tap, and a smart hub for all your favorite content—Goojara makes surfing the web effortless and enjoyable.

Key Features

- Zero Footprints. Total Privacy.
Browse like a ghost in full incognito mode. Goojara keeps no traces of your activity, giving you complete control of your digital life.

- Blazing Fast. Always Smooth.
Lightning-speed page loads and seamless navigation keep you moving at the pace of the web—no waiting, no lag.

- Shortcuts That Stick.
Your favorite sites are always just one tap away. Pin Google, YouTube, Instagram, or any site you love for instant access.

- One Hub for Everything You Love.
Video • Entertainment • AI • Sports • Social — all neatly organized in one clean, easy-to-use bookmarks hub.

- Jump Back In, Instantly.
Revisit saved pages and history with intuitive panels built for quick retrieval. No clutter, no confusion—just your web, remembered.

- Weather, Right in Your Browser.
Stay prepared with real-time local weather updates, built directly into Goojara. No extra apps needed.

With Goojara, you’re not just browsing—you’re living smarter, faster, and safer. It’s your web, simplified.

For an uninterrupted experience, consider subscribing to access all app features without ads through an auto-renewing subscription available on a weekly, monthly, or yearly basis. Manage your subscription settings and turn off auto-renewal within your iTunes Account Settings after purchase, ensuring flexibility and control over your subscription.

Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at:

LANGUAGES

Aviator magazine is the first Finnish digital aviation magazine. We provide aviation news from Finland and abroad. Aviator is a must-read for enthusiasts and professionals who feel passion for aviation.
- Aviator reports about air forces of different countries, authorities and airlines news. 
- Full range of recreational aviation, including the powered flying and gliding, ultra lights, skydiving, and paragliders, hang-gliders, UAVs, scale models, as well as many other types of aircraft description of the history of aviation. 
- The latest news and deep insights with superb photography!
- 8 issues during 2013. Aviator is written in Finnish and all the main articles will have English summaries.

Inkitt Brings Stories to Life

Join Inkitt for the Community

Get feedback on your work, share your favorite science fiction or adventure stories, and explore a treasure trove of fantasy and romance novels. 

Unlimited Reading, A Library of Indie Novels Awaits

The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. Subscribers with a print-only subscription may not have unlimited access. App subscribers have full access to the Web site, including the archive and most recent issue. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail apps@newyorker.com for assistance. 

Non-subscribers may access the app by starting a free trial. A subscription costs $11.99 a month or $119.99 annually, and includes a 7-day free trial, after which it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will state the cost of renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy.

Straight Arrow News delivers unbiased, fact-based news and context, helping you make sense of what’s happening in your world.

Watch the latest news updates and original video podcasts whenever you want through your queue, and read and listen to stories on the go.

Plus, discover reporting you're not seeing from mainstream media outlets. SAN’s Media Miss™ and Media Landscape tools highlight stories right- and left-leaning outlets aren't covering–revealing a more complete picture of the news.

From politics to business, sports, lifestyle and everything in between, SAN covers the stories unfolding around the country and world that matter to you–without spin and with key context that deepens your understanding beyond the headlines.

Independent media ratings groups like AllSides have described SAN’s reporting as Certified Balanced™. Join SAN as we keep raising the bar for journalism in the modern world.

Having trouble? Please reach out to support@san.com

Dofu App – For True Football Fans.

Stay connected to the heartbeat of football like never before. Dofu App delivers lightning-fast updates, powerful insights, and everything a true fan needs — all in one place.

- Lightning-Fast Match Alerts

Goals, penalties, substitutions — get notified instantly as the action unfolds.

- All Fixtures at Your Fingertips

Browse today’s matches, tomorrow’s derbies, and future clashes with easy reminders.

- Smart Match Insights

Go beyond the scoreline with live stats on possession, shots, fouls, and momentum.

- Player Performance Tracker

Follow every move of your favorite stars with detailed player data and records.

- League & Tournament Dashboards

Stay on top of tables across global competitions at a single glance.

- Prediction Stats

Get data-driven forecasts on match outcomes, powered by form, head-to-head records, and team momentum.

With Dofu App, every match feels bigger, every stat sharper, and every moment unforgettable. Whether you’re tracking your club, your country, or the global stage, this is where football lives.

Disclaimer: Predictions in this app are based on statistical analysis and past performance data. They are provided for informational and entertainment purposes only and should not be considered guaranteed outcomes. This app does not offer or promote betting or gambling. We do not support or promote any kind of live sports streaming.

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic

BY DOWNLOADING THE NEW YORK TIMES APP, you agree to:

Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

Get fearless, independent journalism with the Guardian app. Never miss breaking news, dive into diverse opinion pieces, and follow stories minute-by-minute with our dynamic live blogs - from world news and politics to business and sport. Get the following app exclusive features:

My Guardian - Your own custom feed of your favourite topics and writers, so you can follow the stories you care most about. 

Puzzles - Whether you're looking for classics like Soduku and Crosswords, or fun word games like Wordiply and Word wheel, we have the puzzle for you. 

Podcasts - Listen to our award-winning podcasts directly in the Guardian app. 
 
Listen to Articles - Can't read our articles? Listen to them instead. You can get realistic audio transcription of every article we publish - excluding live blogs. 

The Guardian news app is free to download and offers you a beautiful, intuitive mobile experience – so you can read, watch and listen to our independent reporting whenever and wherever it suits you. Readers have a limited number of articles, which refreshes on a regular basis. If you’re a regular reader, you might consider subscribing. Subscribing gives you full access to Guardian articles in our app, so you can read quality, international journalism with no restrictions.

And, when you subscribe, you’ll unlock:

Unlimited reading in the app, with no subscription messages
Ad-free reading, for an uninterrupted experience
Offline reading – download articles to explore on the go

What’s more, subscribing to our news app is a great way to show your support for fearless, independent Guardian journalism. As a reader-funded news organisation, we rely on your funding to power our future. Thank you.

All content in the Guardian app is copyright Guardian News & Media 2025. All rights reserved.

Our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy apply when accessing content via the Guardian app.

Privacy Policy: http://www.theguardian.com/help/privacy-policy

Terms of Service: http://www.theguardian.com/help/terms-of-service

If you subscribe to the Guardian app, our subscription terms will also apply https://www.theguardian.com/info/2023/feb/24/the-guardian-news-app-terms-conditions. Your subscription will auto renew and you will be charged before the next renewal date unless you cancel.

Got a growing TBR list? See great book recommendations, but forget them later? Meet TBR Bookshelf!

Easily track books you want to read, are currently reading, or have finished with no limits. Rate and review books once you’ve read them and log your favorite moments using our quick and intuitive rating system. Browse public ratings to see a book’s POV, tropes, reread rate, and up to four genre-specific ratings. For example, Romance tracks Spice, Fluff, Humor, and Tear. All ratings are anonymous, so you can be honest with your reviews.

Within our rating system, you can log:
* Reading format
* 5 Star Rating including half stars
* Up to four genre ratings
* If you would reread a book
* DNF (Did Not Finish)
* Favorite characters and quotes
* Series and standalone books
* Pro quotes and annotations (Paid Subscription Required)
* Any additional thoughts about the book
Celebrate your reading milestones with special book confetti and earn stickers for completing books and certain book tropes.
Exclusive Pro features include:
* Book tropes
* Book playlists to track songs (cannot be played within the app)
* POV format and amount
* TV show and movie adaptation ratings
* Four seasonal ratings
All users can create custom yearly reading goals. When you finish a book, it is automatically added to your yearly reading goal bookshelf. Pro users can also fully customize their bookshelves with color themes, bookshelf items, and layouts.

TBR Bookshelf makes managing your TBR list fun, easy, and satisfying. Track books, set reading goals, log quotes, and discover new reads all in one place. With customizable shelves, anonymous ratings, and a supportive community, staying on top of your reading has never been more enjoyable.

Join TBR Bookshelf, a woman-owned and operated company, BookTok’s favorite, and trusted by millions of readers.

TBR Bookshelf is free to download and use. No account or sign-up is required. TBR Bookshelf Pro includes a 7-day free trial and then options for a monthly plan ($4.99), a 6-month plan ($19.99), or a yearly plan ($29.99). All other features remain free indefinitely.

A subscription will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of your free trial. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime in your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary.

Note: This app is for tracking your reading journey. Reading is not available within the app.

The CNN app is your destination for unrivaled, fact-based reporting. Stay informed at every turn as the story breaks through short-form videos, interactives, articles, podcasts, live audio and more. Easily discover the day's top news from politics, health, world news, climate and beyond.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.
Delivering in-depth analysis and context that matters from award-winning journalists, so you're prepared for what's next.

DIVE DEEPER WITH LIVE REPORTING.

TAKE A BREAK.
From travel and style news to the latest in entertainment, discover feel-good stories and get a daily dose of positivity.

LISTEN TO STAY CONNECTED.

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

Everything you love about Vogue - anytime, anywhere. Get the news, shop the latest trends, and connect with fellow fashion obsessives from around the world with the Vogue app.

On the Vogue app, you can:
- Get the inside line on the top stories from Vogue editors.
- Engage with fellow fashion enthusiasts in discussions on your favorite topics.
- Shop editor-approved buys and the latest trends all within the app.
- Test your runway IQ with our daily Runway Genius quiz.
- Discover new topics to join the conversation across the globe.
- Never miss a story by following Vogue editors and contributors and exploring their latest posts.
- Take a front row seat at every international show.
- Explore our archive of 20,000+ fashion shows by designer, season, location and type
- Browse 1 million+ runway images— dating back to 1988—with AI-powered image search.
- Vote on your favorite looks, then see how your selects stack up to the Vogue community.
- Save looks and collections to your mood boards, with advanced organizational tools.
- Get a close-up look at all the details from Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, and so much more.
- Follow your favorite brands and topics so you never miss a Vogue moment.
- Share your favorite looks and collections with others via email, text, and social media.
- Browse thousands of photos capturing street style worldwide, shot by our renowned photographers.
- Read reviews from Vogue’s internationally recognized writers for our insider take.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited digital access to Vogue Runway. Users need to be logged in and subscribed to access Vogue Runway content. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail appfeedback@vogue.com for assistance.
